page.title: 12LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: The visible evidence of history in this locality goes back to{prehistoric times. Near Demelza are the ruined ditches and palisades of an{Iron Age {fort.}Farmers make occasional finds of ancient artifacts as they plough their fields. At Brynn Farm is the site of a {mansion}which had its own chapel. It is believed to be one of the homes of the famous Cornish family called Grenville.{Sir Bevil Grenville}was born at Brynn. He became a famous leader of Cornish Infantry in the Civil War.Until Cromwell produced the Ironsides they were the best troops in England.Sir Bevil was killed in battle at Lansdown near Bath.There is a monument to him there. St.Wenn area has had an undisturbed history.The arrival of over 100 war evacuees was a highlight.
